effect.Name: Addition With Arccosinus (Background)
effect.description: Base and blend colors are added after which the colors are reduced by the arccosinus function.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Addition With Arccosinus (Background) Shader | 1.5 (23.09.2025) */
parameter.description: Base and blend colors are added after which the colors are reduced by the arccosinus function.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Background Multiplication
parameter.description: This variable defines the background multiplication factor. In previous versions of FSP shaders, it was _Mixing, but this has now been fixed.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!

parameter.name: Render Switch
parameter.description: This variable specifies which mode of the arccosinus function is to be used. A setting value of 0 uses the arcosinus function used in the current graphics API. A value set to 1 uses the arccosinus function *simulated* from Direct3D9 (not an exact copy) and a value set to 2 uses the arccosinus function *simulated* from Direct3D11 and OpenGL (not an exact copy).
